mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, EMAIL = #{email}, AGE = #{age}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, AGE, PHONE, ADDRESS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{ userId } AND STATUS = 'Y'
